feed.title: Port au Choix - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Port au Choix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:21 PM NST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 01:30 AM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: -11.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 54 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -19.2°C
Wind: NNE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 23 except minus 18 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 23 except minus 18 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 25 except minus 18 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25 except minus 18 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 27 February 2023
